setString

public void setString(java.lang.String name,
                      java.lang.String value)
Saves a name/value pair in the DS. If the name already exists, its value will be replaced by the new one. If not, a new pair is created.

Parameters:
name - The name to store.
value - The value to store.

getString

public java.lang.String getString(java.lang.String name)
Retrieves a value from the DS, given its name.

Parameters:
name - The name of the value to retrieve.
Returns:
The value associated with the name, or null if the name does not exist.
